mapper.select: SELECT r.review_id, r.content_id, r.user_id, r.review_content, r.review_img, r.created_time, u.user_name FROM tb_review r JOIN tb_user u ON r.user_id = u.user_id WHERE r.content_id = #{contentId} ORDER BY r.created_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_review (content_id, user_id, review_content, review_img, created_time) VALUES ( #{contentId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{reviewContent, jdbcType=CLOB}, #{reviewImg, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE )
